name: LOCUS!
description:
LOCUS! A space shooting game

LOCUS! is a space shooting game. Your spaceship flies only on one of the three lines. You see an enemy ship, you shoot. Be careful! There are lasers too!

Your objective is to collect as much points as possible without dying!

This game is still in development...

Controls are simple!
  • Press and hold spacebar to charge laser
  • When the charge is full, release spacebar to shoot!
  • Up and down arrow keys to move
